title: Incorrect calculation of Omon/fgco2 in UKESM1
description:
An error has been found in the calculation of fgco2, the "Surface Downward Flux of Total CO2", in that this has been reported in kg of CO2 rather than kg of carbon, i.e. the values are too large by a factor of approximately 3.67 (44/12). 

All affected datasets have been retracted.
